videoSnippet.title: In Cold Blood! || Caruana vs Lupulescu || Superbet Chess Classic (2021)
videoSnippet.description:
You are awesome! :)
Channel: https://t.me/agadmatorChannel
Bar and the Library: https://t.me/BarAndTheLibrary

Fabiano Caruana vs Constantin Lupulescu
Superbet Chess Classic, Round 2, 6.6.2021.
French, Burn variation (C11)

1.e4 e6 2.d4 d5 3.Nc3 Nf6 4.Bg5 dxe4 5.Nxe4 Nbd7 6.Nf3 h6 7.Bxf6 Nxf6 8.Bd3 Nxe4 9.Bxe4 c5 10.Qe2 Qa5+ 11.c3 cxd4 12.Nxd4 Be7 13.O-O-O O-O 14.Kb1 Rd8 15.Bc2 Bd7 16.Qe4 g6 17.h4 Ba4 18.Bxa4 Qxa4 19.h5 g5 20.Qxb7 Bc5 21.Qc6 Qxc6 22.Nxc6 Rxd1+ 23.Rxd1 Bxf2 24.Rd7 f6 25.Nd8 Bb6 26.Nf7 Rf8 27.Nxh6+ Kh8 28.Kc2

The Superbet Chess Classic is a 10-player classical round-robin taking place in the Sheraton Bucharest Hotel in Bucharest, Romania from 5-14 June 2021. It's the first stage of the 2021 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.275 million.

In Bucharest the players receive 90 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 30 minutes to the end of the game, plus a 30-second increment starting from move one. Official website: grandchesstour.org
